Changelog
=========

0.3 (2009-10-09)
----------------

* Fixed a bug with objects added that have no language set (jcbrand)

0.3 (2009-10-06)
----------------

* Fixed a bug where non-lingua actions also invoke the Lingua Executioner (jcbrand)
* Use the UberSelectionWidget (jcbrand)

0.1 (unreleased)
----------------

* Initial release
